Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseRow

  • Packages that use DatabaseRow 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc
    Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    • Uses of DatabaseRow in org.fluentjdbc

      Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DatabaseRow 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DatabaseRow DatabaseResult.row()
      Returns a DatabaseRow for the current row, allowing mapping retrieval and conversion of data in all columns
